basic.blooming: Flowering period July-August, fruiting period September-October
basic.color: Flower color yellow green, fruit color brown

maintenance.soil: Neutral or slightly alkaline soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
